title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about our smoothie bike service

questions.question: How long does it take to make a smoothie?
questions.answer: It only takes 30 seconds to pedal a smoothie.

questions.question: Do you serve alcoholic cocktails?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. We can mix delicious alcoholic cocktails for weddings and private events. We take care of all legal aspects to ensure everything is safe.

questions.question: What ingredients do you use?
questions.answer: We use natural ingredients like frozen fruits, veggies, and other fresh-tasting options.

questions.question: Do you need electricity?
questions.answer: No. That's the beauty of our bikes—they run entirely on human power only.

questions.question: What happens if it rains?
questions.answer: We can operate indoors if you have suitable space. We will work with you to find the best solution.

questions.question: How much space do you need for installation?
questions.answer: Each smoothie bike requires 1.5 meters by 1.5 meters of space.

questions.question: Can you customize smoothies for our brand?
questions.answer: Yes, we can create custom recipes, use your brand colors, and even add your logo to the bikes, to the cups, and to anything that you want. We can add your logos too.

questions.question: Do you offer decoration to the setting?
questions.answer: Yes, we do! We offer beautiful flower and balloon decorations to elevate the ambiance of your event. Whether you're going for something elegant, playful, or themed, we tailor the décor to match your vision and create a memorable, photo-worthy setup.

questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
questions.answer: We understand that plans can change. Cancellations made more than 10 days before the event are fully refundable. For cancellations 10 days or less, 50% of the deposit is retained.

questions.question: How does Voila Vélo contribute to sustainability?
questions.answer: Our smoothie bikes are powered by people, reducing emissions. We use locally sourced ingredients, eco-friendly packaging, and compostable cups and straws.

questions.question: What happens to unused ingredients?
questions.answer: We donate all leftover ingredients to people in need.

notFound.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
notFound.description: Our team is here to help with any questions you may have.
